verses.verse: The <S%H5036>fool<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, There is no <S%H430>God<s%>. <S%H7843>Corrupt<s%> are <S%H8581>they<s%>, and have done abominable <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>: there is none that <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>.

<S%H430>God<s%> looked <S%H8259>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> upon the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>, to <S%H7200>see<s%> if there <S%H3426>were<s%> any that did <S%H7919>understand<s%>, that did <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.
Every one of them is gone <S%H5472>back<s%>: they are <S%H3162>altogether<s%> become <S%H444>filthy<s%>; there is none that <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>, <S%H259>no<s%>, not one.

Have the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> no <S%H3045>knowledge<s%>? who eat <S%H398>up<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> as they <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>: they have not <S%H7121>called<s%> upon <S%H430>God<s%>.

There were they in <S%H6343>great<s%> <S%H6342>fear<s%>, where no <S%H6343>fear<s%> <S%H430>was<s%>: for God has <S%H6340>scattered<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of him that <S%H2583>encamps<s%> against <S%H954>you<s%>: you have put them to shame, because <S%H430>God<s%> has despised <S%H3988>them<s%>.

Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were come out of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>! When <S%H430>God<s%> brings <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H8055>glad<s%>.
